description.lead: We are a product designer and a frontend developer duo.
description.body: Our goal is to deliver high quality interfaces that solve business problems and offer a great experience to the users.
description.small: We believe that creating a digital products is about solving specific problems and satisfying users' needs.

team.name: Paulina Jadeszko
team.description: I am a Product Designer with over 5 years of experience that I have gained in small agencies, software houses and startups. At that time, I had the opportunity to design mobile applications, web applications and websites for organizations of all sizes from industries such as e-commerce, FinTech, aviation and education. My goal is to maintain a high standard of usability, and user experience and take care of every detail of the visual part of the project.

team.name: Ada Banaszak
team.description: A graduate of cultural studies, but a programmer by profession. I have gained experience in Saatchi & Saatchi IS and SYZYGY agencies for clients such as Microsoft, Mercedes-Benz and the Polish Football Association.
